title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 53 - Life And Annuity Cost Disclosure And Sales Illustrations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 53 - Life And Annuity Cost Disclosure And Sales Illustrations

State Regulations

Subpart 53-1 - General Provisions (§ 53-1.1 to 53-1.6)

Subpart 53-2 - Disclosure Requirements (§ 53-2.1 to 53-2.8)

Subpart 53-3 - Life Illustrations And Reports (§ 53-3.1 to 53-3.7)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 53

Statutory authority: Banking Law, § 263; Insurance

Law, §§201, 301, 308, 1313, 2123, 2208, 2405, 3201, 3203, 3209, 3219, 3222, 4221, 4223, 4226,4231, 4232, 4240, 4510, 4511, 4513, 4518

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
